FCREPO-808: REST getNextPid response does not include default namespace

Classes that inherit from FedoraResponseImpl that use JAXB
to unmarshall XML responses now schema validate if the
System Property test.validate is true.

Adds support for System Property test.debug. When set to
true, server request/responses are logged to System.out, e.g.
mvn -Dtest.debug -Dtest=ModifyDatastreamTest

Includes updated getNextPIDInfo.xsd

https://jira.duraspace.org/browse/FCREPO-808
2011-03-14 20:54:25Edwin Shin <edwin.shin@yourmediashelf.com>src/test/java/com/yourmediashelf/fedora/client/request/ModifyDatastreamTest.java v d25eb1f16336c58c0bdeed721affa18f4f59723c

FCREPO-699: PUT /objects/{pid}/datastreams/{dsid} sets
versionable to true if it is not specified (REST API)

FCREPO-699 was resolved in Fedora 3.4, so this test
no longer needs to be skipped.

https://jira.duraspace.org/browse/FCREPO-699
